title: Late Night Chats | Grace Coddington
description:
Erica Schechter and Zoie Mancino, who assist Seth Meyers and Mike Shoemaker respectively, chat about their responsibilities and lives.

Then, Vogue's Grace Coddington chats with Seth, and then takes a few more questions backstage at Studio 8G.
